title: Kai Neraya Kannadi Lyrics Attu
stanzas:
Kai neraya kannadi
valaiyal saththam
en kanavula kannathula
thaariye muththam.

indha areavil yaarum illa
penne unnaattam
nee asathuriye hindi
padam heroin-aattam

kolusu gulpu kaattudhu
valayal valachi poduthu
dhinusa retta sada
pinnal katti ilukkudhu

mookkuthi morachi paakkuthu
jimikki aattam poduthu
thalukkaa neththi pottu
enna suttu thalludhu.

color-u milk-u white-u ma
kannan tubelight-u maa
udhadu halwa sweetu maa
moththamaa enakku
kedaikkumaa...

aathen abaesh pannitaa
sharpaa saanaa pudichituaa
salpi mittaayathaan
gulphi ice-a aakkittaa

ye Kai neraya kannadi
valaiyal saththam
en kanavula kannathula
thaariye muththam.

indha areavil yaarum illa
penne unnaattam
nee asathuriye hindi
padam heroin-aattam

seo.title: Kai Neraya Kannadi Lyrics Attu
seo.description: Get the complete Kai Neraya Kannadi Lyrics Attu from Attu. Read the lyrics penned by Yuki Praveen and composed by Bobo Shashi and sung by Hyde Karty. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Yuki Praveen, Attu, Bobo Shashi, Hyde Karty, Sindhal Sedhu, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
